name: exchange
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_v2.
Tool description: Find currency and bitcoin prices.
API description: The currency converter service that converts the entered rate into the desired exchange rate.

base.description: The currency code to convert from (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR').

to.description: The target currency code to convert to.

int.description: The amount of money to convert, default is '1'.
